entry.title: The Rambling Man: Undid revision 548722807 by Jayron32 (talk) sorry Jayron32, but there was no clear consensus for the inclusion of the whole article, RD yes, but there's debate over the quality of the update

{{*mp|April 4}} Film critic '''[[Roger Ebert]]''' dies after a long bout with cancer.
  
 
{{*mp|April 3}} More than 50 people die in '''[[2013 Argentina floods|floods]]''' resulting from record-breaking rainfall in [[La Plata]] and [[Buenos Aires]], Argentina.
  
{{*mp|April 3}} More than 50 people die in '''[[2013 Argentina floods|floods]]''' resulting from record-breaking rainfall in [[La Plata]] and [[Buenos Aires]], Argentina.
 
{{*mp|April 3}} Amid '''[[North Korea–South Korea relations#2013|rising tensions]]''', [[North Korea]] closes off entry to the [[Kaesong Industrial Region|Kaesŏng Industrial Region]] and restarts a plutonium-producing reactor at [[Yongbyon Nuclear Scientific Research Center#Restart_of_operation_in_2013|Yongbyon]].
  
{{*mp|April 3}} Amid '''[[North Korea–South Korea relations#2013|rising tensions]]''', [[North Korea]] closes off entry to the [[Kaesong Industrial Region|Kaesŏng Industrial Region]] and restarts a plutonium-producing reactor at [[Yongbyon Nuclear Scientific Research Center#Restart_of_operation_in_2013|Yongbyon]].
Line 13: Line 12:
 
{{*mp|April 1}} [[India]]'s [[Supreme Court of India|Supreme Court]] denies patent protection for a modified version of the cancer drug '''[[imatinib]]'''.
  
{{*mp|April 1}} [[India]]'s [[Supreme Court of India|Supreme Court]] denies patent protection for a modified version of the cancer drug '''[[imatinib]]'''.
 
{{*mp|April 1}} In [[Burma]], private daily newspapers '''[[Media of Burma|go on sale]]''' for the first time since 1964.
 
{{*mp|April 1}} In [[Burma]], private daily newspapers '''[[Media of Burma|go on sale]]''' for the first time since 1964.
  +
{{*mp|March 29}} '''[[Soyuz TMA-08M]]''' ''(mission patch pictured)'' transports three astronauts to the [[International Space Station]] via a new route, reducing the journey's duration from two days to six hours.
